EmailTemplate.subject: April staff assessments now open - sign up to be a Youth Assessor at them now!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
We had our very last Youth Assessor training today, so I'm pleased to let you know that you are now officially part of the London North Youth Assessor team for 2016!
Below is an overview of the up-and-coming assessments available for you to attend during April. Reply to this email with the date(s) that you would like to attend, and we'll send you further details.
There are only three places for Youth Assessors per date, so allocations will be on a first-come-first-served basis.

Megan
